name: Thanfaldur
description:
Thanfaldur is a platformer roguelite, whereby our dwarven hero has to escape the Vault of Thanfaldur. While you upgrade the skills of the hero you also upgrade the vault itself. The Vault contains:

  • Randomly generated layout
  • Over 100 different rooms.
  • 4 monsters and boss versions of them.
  • Treasure!
  • Many dangers, traps and puzzles.

The game was made for the Godot Willd Jam of November 2022 with the theme: "Upgrades". To complete the game it will take between 1-4 hours.

Controls and Settings:

Thanfaldur has an in-game tutorial and is recommended to play with a controller. Fullscreen/Windowed mode, as well as the volume of the music and sound effects can be changed in the in-game option menu.

Keyboard

  • Left: A or ←
  • Right: D or →
  • Crouch: S or ↓
  • Interact: W or ↑
  • Attack: Left mouse button 
  • Bomb: Right mouse button
  • Map: Tab
  • Options/Pause: Esc 

Controller

  • Left: Left (←)
  • Right: Right (→)
  • Crouch: Down (↓)
  • Interact: Up (↑)
  • Attack: (A)   
  • Bomb: (B)
  • Map: Select
  • Options/Pause: Start
